title: Stormspell
description: Ruth was young, she was beautiful, she was ripe for love...but she was innocent,until Dominic invaded her island home,and her heart...Dominic was rich and powerful, bored and world-weary,fighting a temptation he had never before had to face...Indigo was the island,Indigo: Warm and colourful, and seductively romantic; drenched by the tropical sun and washed by the turquoise waters of the Caribbean...And in the aftermath of the storm, it cast its own spell...
author: Anne Mather
